data.text: Very nice hotel, beautiful view towards the garden and very friendly stuff, especially Bou who was very friendly at check-in and check-out. Unfortunately didn‚Äôt get to experience the food within the hotel as we chose to try out restaurants throughout Barcelona.
data.title: Very nice hotel stay

data.text:
The people, Bou, David and the rest of the staff, at the Petit Palace Boqueria Garden were amazing, friendly and professional. The breakfast was fantastic. The hotel room was tranquil and relaxing. Everything we needed for an amazing stay.
Thank you so much.
data.title: Amazing home away from home

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Getaway34600447391,

Thank you so much for your lovely feedback! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that our staff made your experience memorable. It's fantastic to know that you appreciated the view from your room and found the bed and jacuzzi to your liking.

We're delighted that you're already considering staying with us again on your next visit. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back! 

Thank you once again for choosing to stay with us and we hope to see you again soon!

Best regards,

Miguel A. Nieto | Experience manager.
miguel.nieto@petitpalace.com
owner_response.author: Miguel Angel Nieto Martin

data.text:
Very beautiful, cute, friendly hotel!
Food is delicious, people are very friendly. The city is safe and beautiful architecture.
The server Nuria was amazing, gave us all the advices and the tips needed to tour the city! Will come back for sure
data.title: Friendly staff, beautiful hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Adventure39599728589,

Thank you so much for your kind words! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel and that you found it beautiful, cute, and friendly. It's wonderful to know that you appreciated our delicious food and found our staff to be very friendly.

We're delighted that you felt safe in our city and enjoyed its beautiful architecture. It's also fantastic to hear that Nuria provided you with excellent service and helpful tips to explore the city. We'll be sure to pass along your compliments to her!

We can't wait to welcome you back on your next visit! If you need any assistance or have any questions in the meantime, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Thank you for choosing to stay with us, and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Best regards,

Miguel A. Nieto | Experience manager.
miguel.nieto@petitpalace.com
owner_response.author: Miguel Angel Nieto Martin

data.text:
The hotel‚Äôs location couldn‚Äôt be better right in the heart of the Gothic Quarter, it allowed us to explore the winding cobblestone streets, historic architecture, and vibrant atmosphere with ease.  We were able to watch some of the ‚ÄúHolly Week‚Äù processions right from our balcony. For exploring beyond the Gothic Quarter, the hotel‚Äôs proximity to metro stations was a huge plus. Despite being in the middle of Barcelona‚Äôs hustle and bustle, stepping inside this hotel, it is peaceful and tranquil. Amazing. 

The staff were great. Whether we needed recommendations for local restaurants or assistance with transportation, they were always ready to help. They were always friendly and greeted us each day as we came in and out. 

The breakfast buffet is very good. The spread was diverse, offering freshly baked pastries, assorted meats and cheeses, Spanish tortillas, a variety of fruits, and you can even ask for made-to-order eggs.

In summary, if you‚Äôre looking for a well-located, friendly, and comfortable stay in Barcelona, this hotel is an excellent choice. I highly recommend it!
data.title: Great Stay in the Heart of the Gothic Quarter

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Daydream43433053449,

Thank you so much for taking the time to share your wonderful experience with us. We are delighted to hear that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay at our hotel and that our location in the heart of the Gothic Quarter allowed you to immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of Barcelona.

We truly appreciate your kind words about our staff. Providing excellent service and ensuring our guests have a memorable stay is our top priority, so it's wonderful to know that our team members were helpful, friendly, and attentive throughout your visit.

We're glad you enjoyed our breakfast buffet, and we're happy to hear that you found the spread diverse and satisfying. Our aim is to offer a wide variety of options to cater to all tastes and preferences.

Thank you once again for recommending our hotel. It means a lot to us that you had such a positive experience, and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the future for another enjoyable stay.

Warm regards,

Miguel A. Nieto | Experience manager.
miguel.nieto@petitpalace.com
owner_response.author: Miguel Angel Nieto Martin
